item.title: üêç How To Query PostgreSQL with Python
item.description: I wanted to document how I’ve been turning extracts from Postgres into Pandas dataframes. I haven’t spent any time optimizing this code, but it works, and it is pretty easy to read. The only requirement to run these functions would be a valid Postgres database. I’ll walk through: how to create a public PostgreSQL instance in RDS using free-tier RDS The only thing you have to do in the AWS console is create a Postgres DB instance and make sure it is open to the public (just for this example).
